title: Definitely Not Udyr
body:
This Skin... my god... words just cannot describe how amazingly awesome this skin is!

I could barely stop laughing enough to get to my camps on time, and for ganks, i think people just stood still in awe.

Everyone needs to buy this skin, 100% worth!

Thank you Riot, this is the greatest thing you have done in a long while, love it.

replies.body: Yeah, the new Zac skin is totally awesome! :D
